articles.title: Tickermaster's new 'Dynamic Pricing' has forced Bruce Springsteen prices high as $5000 - Daily Mail
articles.description: Mid-floor tickets for the Boss' 2023 US arena tour are going for $4,000 to $5,000 each on Ticketmaster, with less desirable seats still fetching high prices at more than $1,000.
